MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences (System.Web.UI.ScriptManager scriptManager, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> proxies);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences(class System.Web.UI.ScriptManager scriptManager, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> proxies) cil managed

public: static System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::Web::UI::ScriptReference ^> ^ GetScriptReferences(System::Web::UI::ScriptManager ^ scriptManager, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Web::UI::ScriptManagerProxy ^> ^ proxies);
static member GetScriptReferences : System.Web.UI.ScriptManager * seq<System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

Docs.param: The control that is associated with the Web page.
The collection of controls associated with the Web page.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of all controls that are defined in a Web page's control and controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The collection that is returned includes framework scripts that are sent automatically to the client to support AJAX functionality such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> and <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner.GetScriptReferences%2A> method, be aware of the following guidelines:
- <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objects with the same <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties are removed as duplicates.
- <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objects with the same <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> are not removed as duplicates at design time. However, they are removed as duplicates at run time.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method is used to return a fully qualified URL for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objects in the returned collection are cloned versions of the original script references and therefore cannot be modified in designer code by using this collection.
